channel.title: Mark! Silver Media
channel.description: Official project/blog update feed for all things Mark! Silver Media.

item.title: "Mark! Silver" - The Eponymous Album Is Now Available!
item.description: My self-titled album is now available for free download + streaming on Bandcamp: https://marksilver.bandcamp.com/album/mark-silver

item.title: The Groovy Galleon Podcast - Episode 6: Oh, the genres you'll hear.
item.description: And new styles just happen. Don't worry. Don't stew. Just go right along. You'll be loving it too. Oh, the genres you'll hear. Today on the Groovy Galleon Podcast, we will be exploring releases that fall within five distinctly different genres.

item.title: Nostalgia Night (Library Demo)
item.description: Demo by Mark! Silver | Licensed under CC BY 4.0.

item.title: The Groovy Galleon Podcast - Episode 5: The Jamendo Variety Show
item.description: The biggest of the tech giants in silicon valley are hellbent on censoring people who don't fit the narratives they want to push. Luckily, I avoid these particular giants like the plague, so the Groovy Galleon Podcast will continue to thrive.

item.title: Book (Acoustic Demo)
item.description: Demo by Mark! Silver; Co-written by Josh Price | Licensed under CC BY 4.0.

item.title: New Wallpaper: Late Night Mountain Escape
item.description: A wallpaper I designed in Krita. Click the link associated with this post to view it.

item.title: Welcome, RSS Nerds!
item.description: My RSS feed is up and running now! Can you believe it? Be sure to subscribe to this thing so that you don't miss the latest updates/projects/articles/music/podcast episodes/whatnot from myself. :)
